title: Tech Conference 2024
description: Join us for the biggest tech conference of the year featuring industry leaders, innovative workshops, and networking opportunities. Learn about the latest trends in AI, blockchain, and mobile development.

title: Campus Job Fair
description: Meet with top employers and explore career opportunities. Bring your resume and dress professionally. Over 50 companies will be present including tech giants, startups, and consulting firms.

title: Winter Sports Tournament
description: Annual winter sports competition featuring basketball, volleyball, and indoor soccer. Cheer for your favorite teams and enjoy food trucks and live music throughout the event.

title: Study Group: Advanced Mathematics
description: Weekly study group for advanced mathematics students. We'll cover calculus, linear algebra, and statistics. All skill levels welcome. Bring your textbooks and calculators.

title: Art Exhibition Opening
description: Showcase of student artwork including paintings, sculptures, and digital art. Meet the artists, enjoy refreshments, and support your fellow students' creative endeavors.

title: Coding Bootcamp Workshop
description: Intensive 4-hour coding workshop covering React Native, Node.js, and database fundamentals. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers looking to enhance their skills.

title: Campus Clean-up Day
description: Join the sustainability initiative to keep our campus beautiful. Volunteer for 2-4 hours and help with landscaping, recycling, and general maintenance. Free lunch provided.

title: Guest Lecture: Entrepreneurship
description: Inspiring talk by successful startup founder about building a business from scratch. Learn about funding, team building, and overcoming challenges in the entrepreneurial journey.

title: Music Concert: Student Band Night
description: Evening of live music featuring talented student bands from various genres. Rock, jazz, indie, and electronic music. Support local talent and enjoy a great night out.

title: Career Development Workshop
description: Professional development session covering resume writing, interview skills, and networking strategies. Industry professionals will provide personalized feedback and career advice.
